review: I love how this works. Netflix has yet to "bug out" or gave me any kinds of problems. WiFi strength is ok in the basement where I have the TV setup and I have yet to have a buffering issue. The menu is easy to navigate. Watching Netflix on my TV rather than my iPad2 is well worth the $40. If you want to watch your streaming services on a television, this will handle all of you basic services.
author: Cohort

review: Works great. Much faster loading then my Xbox.
author: jeremy gann

review: I LOVE my Fire TV Stick for many reason's.1.  We can take it with us on vacation and watch our Prime TV or HULUPlus etc.2.  It came with a remote - The remote is not really that great until you understand what the symbol's stand for.  Amazon should have put text by the symbols.  That would have made this a 5 star product for me, i give it 4.5 out of 5.3.  Got the app to voice search etc.  LOVE that!!4.  Even though all our TV's are samsung smart tvs the picture quality from fire stick is way better, very weird but I like that a lot.5.  Can stream...  love it.All in all I do love my Amazon Fire Stick and am so happy I bought it.  Highly recommended!!
author: jaguar "Tamela Jaeger"

review: Took me awhile to figure out how it worked.  I am not computer smart.  I love it now that it is working great.  Use almost everyday .
author: Dorothy J. Pletzer

review: We have bought 3 of these!  We have one in the house, one in the shop, and made my daughter buy one when we were visiting, and couldn't get the 'Smart' TV to stream without interruption.We dropped several services from DirectTV, and  I use the Firestick and watch series like Grimm, StarGate, Warehouse 13 and so on while I work.Fast downloads, none of that slow internet connections errors we get while watching regular TV.Bought one for each TV that has an USB port.  (We still have one OLD TV that we can't use it on).
author: Betty

review: I use this on the tv at my school dorm and was worried by some other revues that it'd have problems with the wifi because my dorm's wifi is terrible and often won't even connect to phones and tablets. But this has worked great! I've had it a bit over a week and haven't had a single problem. Also had no trouble opening the remote, idk why people were struggling with that...
author: Micky

review: I ordered 2 of these and when my package came it only had 1 inside it. Not sure how to go about this...
author: Richard Beckett

review: I've had Roku and a Sony Blu Ray player with wi-fi but the Fire Stick has by far the best user interface.  I currently have 3 fire sticks for each of my TVs.
author: Nick D

review: Love it! We used to use Chromecast but were tired of not being able to stream Amazon. I bought this at a lightning sale and am pleased with the purchase. I know that now 'n' days we all use our phone and tablets to control our TV's. This has the beauty of having both! You have a control or you can download the app for when your husband looses the remote! I think the only thing I miss about Chromecast is the beautiful scenic pictures they had. They were amazing. But my husband is happy with his control and my kids can watch Dora/Diego. So you have one happy momma!
author: Happy Family = Happy Mom
